overview: Don Magri is an entrepreneur, start-up veteran, and fueled by small business success. Currently co-founder and CEO of Simply Booked, a Vann Group Company, Donâ€™s entrepreneurial drive began in Boston where he became heavily involved in the start-up community working across various industries to help build businesses from the ground up by instituting financial policies, systems and best practices as well as financial planning for the future. Don is a graduate of Merrimack College where he studied accounting and developed a passion for business that extends way beyond the numbers. Don prides himself on his ability to create a clear financial picture for an organization and assisting business owners in making informed and confident business decisions.
